request.description:
# **Login - Hyper Admin : API Document Specification**

**Request** : Headers

| **Key** | **Type** | **Require** | **Value** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  |  |  |  |  |

**Request** : Body  
Content-Type : application/x-www-form-urlencoded

| **Key/ Field** | **Type** | **Require** | **Value** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| client_id | String | True | admin-cli | fix |
| username | String | True |  |  |
| password | String | True |  |  |
| grant_type | String | True | password | fix |

**Response**: Body  
Content-Type : application/json

| **Key/ Field** | **Type** | **Require** | **Value** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| access_token | String | True |  |  |
| expires_in | Integer | False | 36000 |  |
| refresh_expires_in | Integer | False | 1800 |  |
| refresh_token | String | False |  |  |
| token_type | String | False | Bearer |  |
| session_state | String | False |  |  |
| not-before-policy | Integer | False |  |  |
| scope | String | False | profile email |  |

header.value: KC_RESTART=; Version=1; Expires=Thu, 01-Jan-1970 00:00:10 GMT; Max-Age=0; Path=/realms/master/; Secure; HttpOnly
